```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cluster)
library(factoextra)
library(dendextend)
```

```{r}
computers <- read_csv("data/computers.csv")
glimpse(computers)
view(computers)

```

```{r}
summary(computers)
```


```{r}
clean_computers <- computers %>% 
  select(hd, ram) %>% 
  mutate_all(scale) %>% 
  dist(method = "euclidean")
clean_computers
```


```{r}
fviz_dist(clean_computers, gradient = list(low = "blue", high = "purple"))
```
